name: Firefighting action.
description:
Protect the citizens in this weekly game jam arcade masterpiece!

Controls: Arrow Keys / D-pad  = to move.

                     A button = Action button. (Move ladder while on ground or extinguish fire while mounted)

Controllers and Linux supported!!

Programmer: Zoddhand  

               https://zoddhand.itch.io/

Artist: Akilles_var_den 

               https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198874088445/

Sound: Free Assets

Jam Note: 

         Pretty happy how this turned out. Didn't have time to put time into menus but I might revisit it later.
